metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15128 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the hugetlb_mcopy_atomic_pte function in mm/hugetlb.c in the Linux kernel before 4.13.12. A lack of size check could cause a denial of service (BUG).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-25-generic - 4.13.0-25.29
linux-image-4.13.0-25-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-25.29
